name: oj-transform-zoom
description: transform an element to fullscreen (minus margin)

scripts.build: tsc ./src/index.ts --lib esnext,dom --declaration true --outDir ./dist --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --target es5
scripts.share: npm upgrade && npm version patch -force && npm run build && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org

author: Marius Linders @ Orange Juice<marius.linders@orange-juice.nl>
